original_title: The Cliburn: Playing on the Edge
overview: The heat of competition, the shared dreams, the moments of triumph and disappointment. ... Emmy Award-winning director-producer Peter Rosen presents this stunning behind-the-scenes look at the Eleventh Van Cliburn International Piano Competition. Witness the intense dedication and pure raw energy of these amazing pianists and get an up-close look at the rigorous recitals, piano quintets and concerti led by conductor James Conlon.
title: The Cliburn: Playing on the Edge
